p: Purified proteins were quantified with the Pierce BCA Protein Assay Kit (BCA, bicinchoninic acid), (Thermo Fisher Scientific) according to manufacturerâ€™s protocol. Purity was verified with 15% SDS-PAGE according to Laemmli [ 46] and/or Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer electrophoresis (Agilent Technologies Inc.).
